description: Joins Course Offering to Time Block and provides a way to specify the days and location for a Course.

fields.description: The Course Offering this schedule is for.
fields.inlineHelpText: The Course Offering to which this record belongs.
fields.label: Course Offering

fields.description: The time of day the Course Offering ends. If you've entered a Time Block for this Course Offering, you can leave this field blank.
fields.inlineHelpText: The time of day the Course Offering ends.
fields.label: End Time

fields.description: The location of the scheduled Course Offering.
fields.inlineHelpText: The Facility associated with the Course Offering for the specified time and day of week.
fields.label: Facility

fields.description: Select to indicate this Course Offering is on Fridays. You can select multiple days.
fields.label: Friday

fields.description: Select to indicate this Course Offering is on Mondays. You can select multiple days.
fields.label: Monday

fields.description: Select to indicate this Course Offering is on Saturdays. You can select multiple days.
fields.label: Saturday

fields.description: The time of day the Course Offering starts. If you've entered a Time Block for this Course Offering, you can leave this field blank.
fields.inlineHelpText: The time of day the Course Offering starts.
fields.label: Start Time

fields.description: Select to indicate this Course Offering is on Sundays. You can select multiple days.
fields.label: Sunday

fields.description: Select to indicate this Course Offering is on Thursdays. You can select multiple days.
fields.label: Thursday

fields.description: The Time Block in which this Course Offering is being held.
fields.inlineHelpText: The Time Block in which this Course Offering is being held.
fields.label: Time Block

fields.description: Select to indicate this Course Offering is on Tuesdays. You can select multiple days.
fields.label: Tuesday

fields.description: Select to indicate this Course Offering is on Wednesdays. You can select multiple days.
fields.label: Wednesday

label: Course Offering Schedule
